[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1631462989252{margin-bottom: -20px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/seo-seller.jpg?id=31095) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592922179715{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”custom-hero-aaron”]

MY ULTIMATE GUIDE TO GETTING NEW CLIENTS AND SELLING SEO

Learn How to Start Selling SEO

Starting to sell the service of SEO doesn’t need to be difficult, as my handcrafted step-by-step course makes it as easy as possible to build a new profitable business or add the SEO service to your existing one. Do you want to learn how to start getting new SEO clients? Are you interested in knowing exactly what I do for my clients month-to-month? – then I’m here to help and this course will answer all of your questions!

PURCHASE A LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP FOR $250

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1617738237299{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

SEO SELLER: HOW TO SELL SEO LIKE A CHAMP!

My goal is for you to start making recurring profits while managing new SEO clients

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”30507″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Looking to build a more profitable web design business in 2021? Have you thought about adding Search Engine Optimization (SEO) to your list of services? Possibly starting a small SEO agency from home?

As most of you probably know, my background is in entrepreneurship. I’ve used my knowledge and work ethic to build a successful website design & SEO business that makes well over $5 million a year in sales. Building the A Nerd’s World brand took time, and all started with a tiny Ikea desk in the corner of our one-bedroom apartment and zero investment.

I’d be lying if I said it was easy because it wasn’t. It was a challenging journey with very long hours of work, a steep learning curve, lots of stress coupled with little to no profit in the beginning. Cold calls resulted in zero sales and desperately fighting to survive in this competitive industry. I felt like throwing in the towel on many occasions. I wished that I had someone to turn to, someone that would have answers to the many questions that plagued me.

If you’ve ever thought about selling SEO then this is the course that will take you to the next level. I will teach you how to  find new SEO clients, set up recurring month-to-month campaigns, my exact processes, what is promised to my clients, and what statistics are provided at the end of each month.  Turn your new passion for Search Engine Optimization into a business that is profitable and generates monthly income from anywhere in the world.

Trust me, I want you to see all the success in this world, and I am confident that my new SEO Reseller course is the ultimate way to generate new income in 2021 and beyond. Follow my lead – you got this!

I didn’t learn how to sell SEO by reading about it in books. To be honest, I haven’t read a book since high school. I learned by doing it, making mistakes, dealing with different clients, building a process that works, and constantly testing new methods. Over the last 15 years, I’ve been able to put together an exact recipe for SEO Reselling success, and I am ready to share that with the world.

I know what you are thinking.

How do you start selling SEO in 2021, right?

I created this online SEO Reseller training for those interested in building a new stream of income.  You might want to take on one new client per month, or have great dreams of managing the worlds biggest SEO agency.  I’ve handcrafted step-by-step video tutorials to teach you everything I know about the business of selling SEO in a fraction of the time that it took me.

Included in your membership is a downloadable section with SEO checklists, contracts, client email responses and stats packages. These documents can be used for your own business free of charge.

I share my exact thoughts and processes for building one of the most successful SEO businesses in North America. You can listen in on real SEO sales calls, and I will walk you through the steps one-by-one.

An entrepreneurial spirit is an underlying thread that runs through this course, and I’m excited to share this information with you. Let’s get started![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1617723996560{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Become a Successful SEO Seller

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1617289971391{padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]This course is ultimately for those who are determined to:

  • 42+ step-by-step training videos
  • Not SEO class, this is all about the business of SEO
  • Learn how to sell SEO and what to say
  • How to price your monthly SEO packages
  • Increase profit margins and annual sales x 10
  • 5+ downloadable forms: SEO Checklists, Contracts…
  • My exact process for $500, $1000, $2500+/month SEO clients
  • Special collaborations with industry leaders

Included features:

  • Lifetime access + all future updates included
  • Downloadable documents for your use
  • Exclusive access to our Facebook Group for Q&A
  • Join our one-on-one Zoom classes for FREE
  • This Course is now live!

LIFETIME ACCESS FOR $250[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1617724139120{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ff9d00 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

My SEO Seller Training Curriculum

Over 42+ detailed step-by-step videos, with more being added!

[/vc_column_text][vc_toggle title=”Introduction”]Welcome to my SEO seller course (video)
When should you start selling SEO? (video)
What tools and documents do you need? (video)[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Where to Start?”]How to get started from scratch? (video)
I already own a Web Design business, what should I do next? (video)
Reverse engineering my success (video)
To niche or not to niche? (video)
What guarantees should you make? (video)
How do I collect payment monthly?(video)
Do I have an SEO contract? (video)

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How to Sell SEO”]Preparing for my sales call: Pulling statistics (video)
Websites I open before a sales call (video)
Who should I sell my SEO service to? (video)
How to get your first 3 SEO clients (video)
Sell your web design client monthly SEO services (video)
Listen in on 3 real SEO sales calls (video)
How to market your SEO services (video)[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Mostly Packages and Pricing”]What is your current worth? (video)
Hidden pricing vs. upfront pricing? (video)
Should you offer discounts when starting out? (video)
Requesting a clients monthly budget (video)
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”My Exact Process for Packages”]Exact Process for $500/month package (video)
Exact Process for $1000/month package (video)
Exact Process for $2000/month package (video)
Exact Process for $5000/month package (video)
Exact Process for $10,000/month package (video)
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Communications + Statistics”]My on-boarding process for new clients (video)
How many calls & emails do I have per month with client (video)
Is my process a secret or do I share the details with my clients? (video)
Let’s talk about monthly stats packages (video)

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Conclusion”]SEO is fun, making more money is fantastic! (video)[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1617724239225{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638283827727{padding-top: 15px !important;}” el_class=”faq”]


Exclusive Facebook

Access to an exclusive SEO Seller Facebook group for members of this course.  I will be available to answer any questions you may have about this course and starting your web design business.

LIFETIME ACCESS FOR $250

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638283876869{padding-top: 15px !important;}” el_class=”faq”]


Lifetime Access 

You’ll have lifetime access to this SEO Seller course – view it from all your devices and at your own pace. I’ll update the modules and downloads with new updated video content throughout the year.

LIFETIME ACCESS FOR $250

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638283896938{padding-top: 15px !important;}” el_class=”faq”]


Free Downloads

As a bonus, this course will give ALL of the documents you’ll need in your business including: SEO checklist, contracts, on-boarding documents, prospect questionnaires and much more.

LIFETIME ACCESS FOR $250

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1617724258318{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Lifetime membership to my SEO seller course and all videos, downloads, group Zoom classes and access to an exclusive Facebook Group now only $250 USD.  

Remember, you’re getting lifetime access to the 42+ step-by-step exact process videos, all of my business documents to build your own successful web design business, access to my exclusive FaceBook group and much more…

If you implement all the actionable steps I walk you through in this course, you will be well on your way to financial success in a small fraction of the time that it took me.

I want to see you succeed, and I’ve created an exclusive Facebook group for members only – to answer any questions you may have.  

I will be the mentor you need, and you will have full access.  The ball is in your court, make your move. 


Chris A. Hughes
Co-Founder of A Nerd’s World[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
